summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Twenty-second Avenue North, across Pike's Canal Reserve; Roanoke Street; across a portion of Pike's Canal Reserve; a diagonal street, from Twenty-fourth Avenue North and Louisa Street, to a connection with the proposed boulevard across the Government Canal right-of-way, and a diagonal street, from Nineteenth Avenue North, near Miller Street, to a connection with the proposed boulevard across the Government Canal right-of-way, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property benefited, in the manner provided by law.
